title: The Levitating Cantaloupe That Fires Gamma Rays Out Of Its Nipples

fields.name: Converted from:
fields.value: The Flying Pumpkin That Shoots Laser Beams Out Of Its Ass

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Cantaloupe Things (Night): Choose a target. You will have a 50% chance to fire gamma rays at them dealing a Basic attack, a 25% chance to learn their exact role, and a 25% chance to permanently lower their Defense to None.
- Aim (Night, 1 use): Choose a target. You will deal a Powerful Attack to them if they cannot win with you. You will have a 75% chance of dealing a Basic Attack to them if they do win with you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Anyone who visits you has a 25% chance of being dealt a Basic Attack.
